Title: Directs the metropolitan transportation authority to identify flammable or hazardous materials near above-ground and grade level tracks
Summary: Directs the metropolitan transportation authority, in conjunction with the Long Island Rail Road and the Metro-North Commuter Railroad, to identify flammable or hazardous materials near above-ground and grade level tracks and make recommendations for removal of such materials.
ActClause: AN ACT to direct the metropolitan transportation authority to identify flammable or hazardous materials near above-ground and grade level tracks
